title: Introduction
text: A quick word from the PMs of Waterloop. We’ll share our vision of a sustainable future, the importance of sustainability, and the impact we can provide to the UW community and beyond.

title: A Word from our Keynote Speaker
subtitle: Mike Morrice, MP, Green Party
text: The Green Party’s Mike Morrice is KW’s MP, and a Laurier double degree alumni. Mike aims to put the community first, advocating against wealth inequality, for housing affordability, healthcare, and the promotion of arts and culture. Mike supports a science-based climate plan that meets or exceeds a 50% emission reduction by 2030, ensuring a just transition where no one is left behind, at the scale of a Green New Deal.

title: Design Team Presentations
text: Midnight Sun, Sustainable Development Solutions Network, Waterloo Formula Electric, and Warrior Home will be presenting what it is like to be a part of their team! They will also be talking about their team’s sustainable practices, and how they are helping shape a greener and cleaner future.

title: Waterloop's Presentation
subtitle: ...followed by Event Conclusion
text: Waterloop is proud to present the benefits of Hyperloop as a technology form, and the latest developments for our very own Goose 5.5 pod, which features contactless propulsion via linear induction motor, a carbon fibre aeroshell, and an in-house developed custom battery pack and battery management system.
